Package server

Class GameServer

java.lang.Object
server.GameServer
public final class GameServer extends Object
This class represents an UNO GameServer listening for a limited number of socket connections for an UNO Game. It starts the game as soon as the maximum number of Players have successfully connected to the server.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameServer

      public GameServer(int port, int maxPlayers)

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute()
      Starts the server socket listening for connections each spawning off a PlayerThread. Creates the Game object associated with the server. Sets the game status to WAITING_FOR_PLAYERS

    • processNewPlayer

      public void processNewPlayer(Player player, PlayerThread playerThread)
      Adds the player to the Game object started by the server Starts the game and sets its status to model.GameStatus.IN_Progress if all players have joined
      Parameters:
      player - The player to be added
      playerThread - The playerThread associated with the player

    • endConnections

      public void endConnections()
      Broadcasts message to terminate player threads.

    • messagePlayer

      public void messagePlayer(String message, Player player)
      Sends a message to the player.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to be transmitted to the player.
      player - THe player receiving the message.

    • askPlayer

      public String askPlayer(String question, Player player) throws IOException
      Asks a question to the player through the associated thread.
      Parameters:
      question - The question to be asked
      player - The player to ask
      Returns:
      The player's response
      Throws:
      IOException - In case of error processing input

    • broadcast

      Sends a message to all the Players of the associated Game.
      Parameters:

    • broadcastToAllExcept

      public void broadcastToAllExcept(String message, Player excluded)
      Sends a message to all the Players of the associated Game except one Player.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to transmit
      excluded - The excluded Player

    • broadcastMessage1ToOthersMessage2ToPlayer

      public void broadcastMessage1ToOthersMessage2ToPlayer(String message1, String message2, Player other)
      Sends a message to all the Players of the associated Game except one Player.
      Parameters:
      message1 - The message to transmit to all players except the other player
      message2 - The message to transmit to the other player
      other - The Player receiving message2

    • processMove

      public void processMove(PlayerThread playerThread, String move) throws IllegalMoveException, IllegalCardStringException, IOException
      Parameters:
      playerThread - The thread sending the move from the player
      move - The player's move
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - If move is invalid according to game rules
      IllegalCardStringException - If an invalid string is sent
      IOException - If there's error processing input/output

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Starts the server.
      Parameters:
      args -
      args[0] - The port to start the server socket on
      args[1] - The maximum number of players allowed in the game
